add_library(nvtt SHARED IMPORTED GLOBAL)

set_target_properties(nvtt PROPERTIES
	INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include"
	IMPORTED_IMPLIB "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/nvtt.lib"
	IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/nvtt.dll")

foreach(CONFIG ${CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES})
	file(COPY "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/nvtt.dll" DESTINATION ${CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY}/${CONFIG})
endforeach()
